shortName.description:
Used anywhere a shortened form of the creatures name is required (e.g. in legendary action headers).
If not supplied, a shortened name will be automatically generated from the creature's full name.
Alternatively use "true" if the "shortName" should be an exact copy of the creature's "name".

group.description:
A group name, indexed by search. E.g. searching "Lycanthrope" would otherwise fail to find anything.
Only works on the bestiary page, not in the full site search.

level.description: Used in sidekicks, which can have levels (and generally do not have alignment)

swarmSize.description: Size of the individual creatures that make up the swarm.

sourceSub.description: Sub-source text that is shown when hovered.

sort.description: Forces a sort order. Traits with sort orders will always be arranged before those without.

items.description:
X: Any (Choose)
 XX: All
 CS: Can't Speak Known Languages
 LF: Languages Known in Life
 TP: Telepathy
 OTH: Other
 -

 AQ: Aquan

 D: Dwarvish
 DR: Draconic
 DS: Deep Speech
 DU: Druidic

 G: Gnomish
 GI: Giant
 GO: Goblin
 GTH: Gith
 H: Halfling
 I: Infernal
 IG: Ignan
 O: Orc
  P: Primordial
 S: Sylvan
 T: Terran
 TC: Thieves' cant
 U: Undercommon

B: Blindsight
 D: Darkvision
 SD: Superior Darkvision
 T: Tremorsense
 U: Truesight

P: Psionics
 I: Innate
 F: Form Only
 S: Shared
 O: Other
 CA: Class, Artificer
 CB: Class, Bard
 CC: Class, Cleric
 CD: Class, Druid
 CP: Class, Paladin
 CR: Class, Ranger
 CS: Class, Sorcerer
 CL: Class, Warlock
 CW: Class, Wizard

AOE: Has Areas of Effect
 HPR: Has HP Reduction
 MW: Has Weapon Attacks, Melee
 RW: Has Weapon Attacks, Ranged
 RCH: Has Reach Attacks
 MLW: Has Melee Weapons
 RNG: Has Ranged Weapons
 THW: Has Thrown Weapons

summonedBySpell.description: The spell used to summon this creature; specifically for TCE-esque summon spells.

summonedBySpellLevel.description: The level of the spell used to summon this creature; specifically for TCE-esque summon spells.

summonedByClass.description: The class which can summon this creature; e.g. for those granted by some TCE class features.

_isCopy.description: An internal flag indicating this creature is a copy of another, and is a temporary/placeholder entry which will be factored out using the "_copy" format at a later date.

shortName.description:
Used anywhere a shortened form of the creatures name is required (e.g. in legendary action headers).
If not supplied, a shortened name will be automatically generated from the creature's full name.
Alternatively use "true" if the "shortName" should be an exact copy of the creature's "name".

anyOf.$comment: This is a custom pre-processor tag, which merges together the array of objects into one. This allows proper inheritance, which JSON schema don't really do.

shortName.description:
Used anywhere a shortened form of the creatures name is required (e.g. in legendary action headers).
If not supplied, a shortened name will be automatically generated from the creature's full name.
Alternatively use "true" if the "shortName" should be an exact copy of the creature's "name".

data.description: A generic object for storing special data for external use-cases. Keys prefixed with "rd-" should be added as "data-" HTML attributes when rendering to HTML.
A generic object for storing special data for external use-cases. Keys prefixed with "rd-" should be added as "data-" HTML attributes when rendering to HTML.

monster.$comment: This is necessary as some site bestiary files assert only otherSources and do not contain any true data.
